status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the CSV download operation

csv_type.title: CSV Type
csv_type.description: Type of CSV that was downloaded

csv_filename.title: CSV Filename
csv_filename.description: Name of the downloaded CSV file

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: Size of the downloaded file in bytes

download_method.title: Download Method
download_method.description: Method used to download the CSV (direct_url, button_click, link_scan, multiple_attempts)

cookies_saved.title: Cookies Saved
cookies_saved.description: Whether cookies were saved for future runs

webhook_sent.title: Webhook Sent
webhook_sent.description: Whether the CSV was sent to n8n webhook

job_id.title: Job ID
job_id.description: Specific job ID if provided in input
